D & L

Design & Logos

Most people have strong opinions about brands they like and dislike but few will have much to say about brands that are invisible. Your brand image and logo are the visual projections of your business concept- they need to be in synch with all other aspects of your business plan. Let the design team at BuildaWebDoctor help you visualize your brand logo or simply make some improvements to your old one.

After an initial consultation, our design team will create and present three concepts/ideas, and once you have a favorite you will be able to revise it up to three times. All logos will be provided as high resolution vector files including a .psd and an .AI file, with the possibility to accommodate any other file format you may require.
